pages.text: In most cases, elements are in a stable state and interact with each other to form the whole world. However, through the use of spiritual, the element can be made active. At this time, according to the characteristics of each element, some elements will trigger reactions, that is, elemental reactions.

The active state of elements is divided into strong and weak cases, the elements of strong active state are referred to as robust elements, and the elements of weak active state are referred to as weak elements. Robust elements have higher reaction priority than weak elements, and robust elements can participate in all reactions of weak elements.

Through spell and other means, you can attach a certain amount of elements to the creature, these elements will decay over time, and you can see the elements that are currently attached above its head.
